poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: It's a rag in rhythm it's a tic it's a needlestuck Fugue it's a rag in rhythm it's a tic it's a needle Stuck fugue it's a rag in rhythm it's a tic it's a n It's a needlestuck fugue and it's a riff (riff) And it's a riff riff and it's a riff Riff and it's a riff
